overview: The Barkers dream of becoming famous and conquering the Internet. They know how to dance and make funny videos that collect likes and views, but they are still far from the real stars of the Internet, such as Kitty Cat. By chance, Kat becomes their neighbor, not only friendship, but also rivalry develops between them. Mentor Kat is not very happy with her competitors and is trying to bring discord into a friendly family...
title: The Barkers Team
